basics.name: Harsh Sahu
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: I am a dedicated web developer with a strong expertise in frontend technologies and exposure to backend development. I design and develop web applications using cutting-edge technologies to ensure high-quality, efficient code delivery.
basics.objective: Eager to expand my skill set through continual learning opportunities and contribute these skills to drive innovative and efficient solutions. Passionate about leveraging technology to enhance user experiences.

work.name: Tech Solutions
highlights: * Leading a team of 7 developers to build efficient web applications
* Spearheading projects using React for improved user interactivity
work.summary:
• Utilizing extensive experience in frontend development to architect and build scalable project structures
  • Ensuring code quality by leading code reviews and proposing enhancements
  • Collaborating with designers to materialize design concepts into functional interfaces
  • Contributing to E-commerce advancements with Fastcommerce, a leading e-commerce platform

work.name: Innovate Tech
highlights: * Developed web applications using Sharepoint, Drupal 8, and Episerver
work.summary:
• Developed web applications using Sharepoint, Drupal 8, and Episerver
  • Managed a team of 8 developers, providing technical support and clarifications
  • Reported project progress to Project Managers and IT Leads, ensuring alignment with requirements
  • Ensured compliance of code and features with project requirements

work.name: Digital Innovations
highlights: * Worked on web application development for small companies
work.summary:
• Designed user-friendly interfaces for digital platforms of small companies
  • Developed Wordpress themes, plugins, and provided training
  • Managed Magento e-commerce platforms, customizing preexisting themes and integrating external services

activities.involvements:
• Initiated tests that revealed bugs in new shopping cart software, preventing sales tax undercharges worth millions
  • Discovered flaws in price checking tools, increasing competitiveness and revenue by 20%
  • Implemented automated testing tools for regression, negative testing, and usability improvements
activities.achievements:
• Completed 'React and Redux - A Complete Guide 2020' from Udemy
  • Obtained Agile and Scrum Master Certificate from Udacity
  • Recognized as 'Best Performer' for consistent high-performance
  • Certificate of 'Exceptional Bug Finder' by XYZ client

volunteer.summary: Organized hackathons and meetups to foster community growth
